DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study observe anatomical functional outcome ocriplasmin ( JETREA® ) 6-month follow-up period .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Patients Treated With JETREA® Vitreomacular Traction
DOC.detailed_description: After receive single intravitreal injection per country 's product label ( Day 0 ) , subject follow 6-month period ( Day 180 ) .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis vitreomacular traction/symptomatic vitreomacular adhesion ( VMT/sVMA ) , evidence focal VMA visible Spectral Domain Optical Coherence Tomography ( SDOCT ) . Read , sign , date Institutional Review Board/Ethics Committeeapproved inform consent form . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Women childbearing potential pregnant , breastfeeding , agreement use adequate birth control method prevent pregnancy throughout study . Hypersensitivity ocriplasmin JETREA® excipients . Active suspect intraocular periocular infection . Presence Epiretinal Membrane ( ERM ) macula baseline . Broad VMT/VMA > 1500 micron baseline . History vitrectomy study eye . History laser photocoagulation macula study eye . Any relevant concomitant ocular condition , opinion investigator , could expect worsen require surgical intervention study period . Macular hole > 400µm diameter study eye . High myopia study eye . Pseudoexfoliation , Marfan 's syndrome , phacodonesis find Investigator 's opinion suggest lens/zonular instability . Aphakia . History retinal detachment . Diabetic retinopathy , ischaemic retinopathy , retinal vein occlusion . Recent ocular surgery ocular injection . Vitreous hemorrhage . Exudative agerelated macular degeneration ( AMD ) . Therapy another investigational agent within 30 day prior Visit 1 . Active , simultaneous enrollment another ophthalmology clinical study . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
